message.content:
I need to identify the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period from the given cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see a section titled "Cash and Cash Equivalents" with three line items:
- Beginning Balance
- Ending Balance
- Net Increase

The Beginning Balance represents the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period, which is reported as 8000000.00 on 2024-01-29.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '8000000.00'} }
```
